summary: How to fix the annoying solonor bug
descriptionHtml:
This is a tutorial to fix the Solonor Shots Bug:

It's from SkyRE, everytime you get near Maven Black Briar you'll get 50 Solonor Shots (arrow ammo), because she has Solonor Bow and it fires magical shots... anyway...

After a long rage against this bug, I started to try to remove it from her, hoping it would fix the bug, guess what, it fixed.

Here's the solution:

1- You need to get near Maven.
2- Use ' to open the console.
3- Right click on Maven to select her as the target.
4- Write "openactorcontainer 1" in the console (whithout the quotes)
5- Take away Solonor from her.
6- Right click again on her to remove her from target.
7- Write "player.removeitem 25020AE4 999" to remove your Solonor shots.
8- Write "player.removeitem 25020AE5 1" to remove your Solonor.

Now, she won't have Solonor anymore and you won't get it ammo.
And sorry for my english :D
author: Dranzzel
